name: Public Warning System
summary: The Public Warning System feature introduces a notification system for public

parameters.name: Paging.noOfDefPagCyclPrim
parameters.type: Introduced

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.emergencyAreaId  EUtranCellTDD.emergencyAreaId
parameters.type: Introduced

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.mappingInfo (mappingInfoSIB10)  EUtranCellTDD.mappingInfo (mappingInfoSIB10)
parameters.type: Introduced
parameters.description: Defines to which SI message SIB10 is mapped. The recommended value of                                 the periodicity for this SI message is 8 radio frames (80 ms).

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.mappingInfo (mappingInfoSIB11)  EUtranCellTDD.mappingInfo (mappingInfoSIB11)
parameters.type: Introduced
parameters.description: Defines to which SI message SIB11 is mapped. The recommended value of                                 the periodicity for this SI message is 64 radio frames (640 ms).

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.mappingInfo (mappingInfoSIB12)  EUtranCellTDD.mappingInfo (mappingInfoSIB12)
parameters.type: Introduced
parameters.description: Defines to which SI message SIB12 is mapped. The recommended value of                                 the periodicity for this SI message is 64 radio frames (640 ms).

parameters.name: Paging.defaultPagingCycle
parameters.type: Affecting

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.siWindowLength  EUtranCellTDD.siWindowLength  NbIotCell.siWindowLength
parameters.type: Affecting

parameters.name: siPeriodicitySI(x)
parameters.type: Affecting
parameters.description: Defines the periodicity of the SI(x) message to which an SIB is                                 mapped.  Please observe that siPeriodicitySI(x) is no real                                 parameter name, x denotes that the parameter is general for all SI                                 messages. The parameters siPeriodicitySIx (with                                 x=1-10) are members in the struct PeriodicitySI                                 which is the type of attributes                                     EUtranCellFDD.siPeriodicity and                                     EUtranCellTDD.siPeriodicity.   Mapping to SIx have the following three ways:    SIB10 is mapped to SIx.  The recommended value of the periodicity is 8 radio frames                                         (80 ms).     SIB11 is mapped to SIx.  The recommended value of the periodicity is 64 radio frames                                         (640 ms).     SIB12 is mapped to SIx.  The recommended value of the periodicity is 64 radio frames                                         (640 ms).

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_EVENT_ETWS_REPET_COMPL
parameters.type: One repetition of an ETWS message has been completed or                                     interrupted by replacement of the ongoing ETWS message. A                                     repetition comprises one paging message, with                                         etws-Indication set, sent during one full                                     paging cycle.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_ETWS_REPET_STOPPED
parameters.type: The repetitions of an ETWS message have been stopped. The normal                                     reason is that requested number of repetitions have been                                     performed. Other reason can be that repetition has been                                     interrupted by replacement of the ongoing message.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_ETWS_REPET_STOPPED

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011252 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011252 MO instance.
